en.name: roll
en.description: Roll a dice! Although the randomness generated is seeded by the time (Assuming the bot is running in nodejs), therefore allowing anyone to get any value, the randomness is achieved in the delay for your message to be interpreted.

examples.description: Returns a random value from each die from 1-6, and displays the total for the dice.
Returns a random value from each dice from 1 to the number of sides selected.
Returns a random value from each die from 1 to the number of sides selected, and displays the total for the dice.

pi.name: roll
pi.description: Sail by the luck of the sea!

examples.description: Get yer number of sailors to go overboard, from 1 to 6
Get yer number of sailors to go overboard, with many 6 sided die
Get yer number of sailors to go overboard, from 1 to how many you chose
Get yer number of sailors to go overboard, with yer number of dice and yer number of sides
